publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5717 Dr Jean Turner: Congratulations to St Mary’s Nursery School, Kirkintilloch—That the Parliament congratulates the children and staff of St Mary’s Nursery School in Kirkintilloch for their recent attainment of an Eco Schools bronze award; notes the enthusiasm with which the children have become involved in recycling and caring for their environment, and wishes them well in their efforts to gain a silver award and then the coveted Green Flag. Supported by: Ms Sandra White*, Ms Maureen Watt*, Alex Johnstone*, Eleanor Scott*, Murray Tosh*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Carolyn Leckie*, Elaine Smith*, Robin Harper*, Frances Curran*
S2M-5717 Congratulations to St Mary’s Nursery School, Kirkintilloch (lodged on 7 March 2007) Tommy Sheridan*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Chris Ballance*

S2M-5717 Dr Jean Turner: Congratulations to St Mary’s Nursery School, Kirkintilloch—That the Parliament congratulates the children and staff of St Mary’s Nursery School in Kirkintilloch for their recent attainment of an Eco Schools bronze award; notes the enthusiasm with which the children have become involved in recycling and caring for their environment, and wishes them well in their efforts to gain a silver award and then the coveted Green Flag. Supported by: Ms Sandra White, Ms Maureen Watt, Alex Johnstone, Eleanor Scott, Murray Tosh, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Carolyn Leckie, Elaine Smith, Robin Harper, Frances Curran, Tommy Sheridan, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Chris Ballance
S2M-5717 Congratulations to St Mary’s Nursery School, Kirkintilloch (lodged on 7 March 2007) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-5717 Congratulations to St Mary’s Nursery School, Kirkintilloch (lodged on 7 March 2007) Donald Gorrie*

S2M-5717 Dr Jean Turner: Congratulations to St Mary’s Nursery School, Kirkintilloch—That the Parliament congratulates the children and staff of St Mary’s Nursery School in Kirkintilloch for their recent attainment of an Eco Schools bronze award; notes the enthusiasm with which the children have become involved in recycling and caring for their environment, and wishes them well in their efforts to gain a silver award and then the coveted Green Flag. Supported by: Ms Sandra White, Ms Maureen Watt, Alex Johnstone, Eleanor Scott, Murray Tosh, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Carolyn Leckie, Elaine Smith, Robin Harper, Frances Curran, Tommy Sheridan, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Chris Ballance, Mr Adam Ingram, Donald Gorrie
